foundations.title: Maybelline New York Fit Me Matte + Poreless FOUNDATION-110 porcelain
aboutThisItem: Up to 16 Hours of Matte Wear: Delivers long-lasting, shine-free coverage that stays put all day.
Oil-Free & Acne-Safe: Formulated without oils—won’t clog pores or trigger breakouts.
Lightweight & Poreless Finish: Perfect for oily skin, this breathable foundation provides a smooth, pore-blurring effect.
Advanced Matte Formula: Infused with clay micro-powders to absorb excess oil and reduce shine.
Natural, Seamless Look: Leaves skin looking matte and even-toned with a flawless, natural finish.
Skin-Friendly: Dermatologist-tested, allergy-tested, and non-comedogenic for safe everyday wear.
